response.original_title: Stud Muffin the Pimp The Musical
response.overview: This VR short film is the origin story of Stud Muffin the Pimp.  And the first musical filmed completely in VRChat, the most popular social virtual reality platform that exists today.  VR Film is an unexpected result of social VR platforms . And its growing popularity is only a fraction of what the future holds for this futuristic genre of filmmaking. Jumping into virtual reality to create whatever story you can imagine, is now a reality.
response.tagline: This VR short film is the origin story of Stud Muffin the Pimp.
response.title: Stud Muffin the Pimp The Musical
